changeSet.createView: SELECT pp.ENTITY_ID, pp.DEAL_ID, pp.START_DATE, pp.END_DATE, pp.CURRENCY_CODE, pp.CREATE_UPDATE_DATETIME, pp.UNIT_OF_MEASURE_CODE, pp.VOLUME_QUANTITY, pp.COST_NAME_CODE, pp.COST_VALUE, pp.IS_SETTLEMENT_POSITION, pp.IS_FIXED_VALUED, dc.UNIT_OF_MEASURE_CODE AS COST_UNIT_OF_MEASURE, dc.CURRENCY_CODE AS COST_CURRENCY_CODE, pp.COST_FX_RISK_FACTOR_ID FROM COST_POSITION pp INNER JOIN DEAL_COST dc ON dc.ENTITY_ID = pp.DEAL_COST_ID
